resources: One Original Genome How many types of muscles are there in the human body? What are teeth made of? How long is your large intestine? Which parts of the human body contain the ring-like muscles called sphincters? What happens to the brain after a night of heavy drinking? What are young wolves called? Why do wolves howl? How fast can a gray wolf run? Gray wolves were successfully reintroduced into what U.S. national park? Which animal is very big and has black and white stripes? What will happen to a plant left in the dark? What will happen to a plant that is left un-watered? Which three things do plants need to make food? vGrass does not grow as quickly during the winter as it does during the summer. What could be a reason for this?? Which part makes food for the plant?
